channel.title: Sad Romance - Chiroto (acoustic guitars remix?)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/chiroto/sad-romance-chiroto
Inspired by the new pack’s demo while seeking full songs (i used/atered 3 loops).
There goes my review. The guitar sounds cannot mimic the fret sounds, slides, fingers, open/muted strings, velocity and especially the high notes an not so real. Guitar solos are weak.
You can, however, with some ghost notes make it sound like muted strings and using the length you can have an open string feeling. You can also play with the soft notes, it acts like a humanizer with guitars.
Note, I am not a guitarist, this is just a feedback for anyone who is interested.
Co-inspired by a 3-day trip in a remote area with very low population and unlimited nature.
Cheers

item.title: Sad Romance - Chiroto (acoustic guitars remix?)
item.dc:creator: Chiroto
item.description:
https://soundcloud.com/chiroto/sad-romance-chiroto

Inspired by the new pack’s demo while seeking full songs (i used/atered 3 loops).

There goes my review.
The guitar sounds cannot mimic the fret sounds, slides, fingers, open/muted strings, velocity and especially the high notes an not so real. Guitar solos are weak.

You can, however, with some ghost notes make it sound like muted strings and using the length you can have an open string feeling. You can also play with the soft notes, it acts like a humanizer with guitars.

Note, I am not a guitarist, this is just a feedback for anyone who is interested.

Co-inspired by a 3-day trip in a remote area with very low population and unlimited nature.

Cheers
